snippet.title: Polish Simulator
snippet.description:
Steam: Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3447730?utm_source=YouTubeENG

Welcome to the reality of Polish life, where everyday routines revolve around open conflicts with your neighbor, scheming, grilling, and finding ways to make your life easier—or making someone else's harder.

Each task in the game can be solved in multiple ways. It's up to you whether you go for quick and obvious solutions or come up with something more elaborate. Some methods will be apparent right away, but the most effective ones often require a bit of creativity to discover.
